job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>5+ years of Experience in managing highly-scalable and distributed systems.</li><li>Knowledge of Web Services, HTTP/HTTPS Protocols.</li><li>Knowledge of Data Security, SSL, Certificates, etc.</li><li>Strong problem solving, and troubleshooting skills</li><li>Experience in performance tuning of the applications including JVM tuning, memory profiling.</li><li>Provide OnCall support to 1st level production support teams.</li><li>Fast learner who is generous with their knowledge</li><li>Self-directed, demonstrates leadership potential, and a great teammate.</li><li>Experience with container orchestration systems like Kubernetes, and Continuous Delivery platforms like Spinnaker</li></ul>
